Welcome to ruche’s documentation!¶

ruche is a package manager for Windows. It’s designed to help developers to implement a clean and portable development environment.

This guide is divided in two parts: The User Documentation in which you will find information and tutorials about the installation and the usage of ruche, and the Developer Documentation which contains an API reference and some technical information.

  • User Documentation
  • Developer Documentation
